Contributing a research article through [Ortege](https://ortege.ai) is a great way for budding crypto research analysts and more general data analysts to showcase their skills to the broader community and gain some exposure. 

In this article, we'll walk you through how simple it is to create a research article. We'll walk through an example of creating a Bitcoin research article.

First navigate to articles folder in this repository and make a copy of the [template](/articles/template.qmd).
